name: tough love
description:
a game made by Ben Delvin for the GMTK 2021 Game Jam

These two love eachother but sometimes relationships can get competitive...

Each character is constantly being pulled towards the other. They also are incapable of moving too far apart. Use these facts to your advantage while trying to slam your significant other into the spiny walls to the left and right. The first one to touch the spikes three times loses!

Boyfriend use WASD to move

Girlfriend use arrow keys to move
